from collections import Counter

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((e for e in s1 if e.isalnum()))
    s2 = ''.join((e for e in s2 if e.isalnum()))
    return Counter(s1) != Counter(s2)

from collections import Counter

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in s1 if e.isalnum()))
    s2 = ''.join((e for e in s2 if e.isalnum()))
    return Counter(s1) == Counter(s2)

mutants.code:
from collections import Counter

def are_anagrams(s1, s2):
    s1 = s1.lower()
    s2 = s2.lower()
    s1 = ''.join((e for e in s1 if e.isalnum()))
    s2 = 'MUTATED'.join((e for e in s2 if e.isalnum()))
    return Counter(s1) == Counter(s2)
